description: Try our easy to follow Couscous, Chorizo & Zucchini Salad recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Couscous, Chorizo & Zucchini Salad Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Stir in tomato, onion, zucchini, parsley and chorizo. Drain 1/3 cup oil from feta into a jug. Whisk in lemon juice, and season with salt and pepper. Add dressing to the salad and combine. Top with crumbled feta and serve.
